Articles.Content:
![Kerbol%20System%20Poster%20Mk%20IV_zpsb11dvmfx.jpg~original](http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a572/rockbloodystar/Kerbol%20System%20Poster%20Mk%20IV_zpsb11dvmfx.jpg~original)

All radii of bodies are to the same log scale.

All SMAs of bodies in orbit around Kerbol are to the same log scale.

All SMAs of bodies in orbit not around Kerbol are to the same log scale.

Anyone know how to help me make them more than plain colour?

Cheers,

RBS.
